entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 6:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and rain showers late this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
